description:
While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido. Hearing Kaido jeering at them for being weak, the samurai retainers attack him relentlessly, remembering the day Oden told them to master his sword skill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden`s Secret Swordplay!
Die geerbte Technik – Lasst Odens Geheimklinge aufblitzen
Le secret passe de main ! Que s’abatte la lame d’Oden !
Uketsugishi Waza: Sakuretsu Oden no Hiken
¡La furia de Yamato! ¡El sueño de Oden!
تقنية متوارثة! إطلاق مسايفة أودن السّرّيّة!
受け継ぎし技 炸裂おでんの秘剣
